mapper.update: update deploy_history set endpoint_id = #{endpointId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, endpoint_name = #{endpointName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, project_id = #{projectId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, project_name = #{projectName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, `status` = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, `describe` = #{describe,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, his_file_name = #{hisFileName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, oper_user_cname = #{operUserCname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, oper_log = #{operLog,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select id, endpoint_id, endpoint_name, project_id, project_name, `status`, `describe`, his_file_name, oper_user_cname, create_time, oper_log from deploy_history
